publicwhip.spmotion: S2M-3868 Tavish Scott: The Draft Transfer of Functions from the Strathclyde Passenger Transport Authority and the Strathclyde Passenger Transport Executive to the West of Scotland Transport Partnership Order 2006â€”That the Local Government and Transport Committee recommends that the draft Transfer of Functions from the Strathclyde Passenger Transport Authority and the Strathclyde Passenger Transport Executive to the West of Scotland Transport Partnership Order 2006 be approved. Supported by: Ms Margaret Curran
